column4: Delicious Italian food and wine. The waiter was really friendly, the appetisers excellent and we enjoyed real Italian food with our kids.
We found this gem after searching online. The pizza was great. The service was great. Cozy, intimate, and close to a wonderful view of the city. Go at night and get a view of the Eiffel Tower lit up.
Can highly recommend Babalou.Great pizza and atmosphere.Good service really liked this small restaurant. One of the best pizza

Restaurant responsible was looking at us and talking to us in a derogatory way from the moment we arrived. We could not take a pizza to share because THEY WON‚ÄôT USE A TABLE JUST TO SERVE ONE PLATE! Incredible!

column3: Best meal we had in Paris!
column4: Excellent food and fast service. Pizza offers blew my mind...definitely worth to visit! If in doubt what to order, go with mixed cheese and ham plate. So private and cosy, on a minute of walk from Sacre-Coeur
Lovely meal with good food. Staff was lovely but they could have used another one or two waiters as they took a while to take our order. Nice atmosphere.

column3: Favorite Restaurant during trip to Paris!
column4: This place is a hidden gem! While Paris has SO many food options, this one is my favorite. Great local stop, and the pizza is wonderful! It has a cozy atmosphere that we loved.
One of the best pizza I ever eaten. Very friendly people working there. I would recommend this place nearby sacre queur.
The pizza was fantastic and the owners were amazing. Would recommend this place 1000 times out of 1000.
The owners were very kind and we had great service. The pizza is the star. We had a white with artichokes, mushrooms, and I think truffles. So good! My son had the pasta which he devoured.
Fantastic little pizzeria. Very attentive staff and the food was delicious! Great value for money too.
This is an excellent pizza place near Sacre Coeur. Everything is freshly made, with high quality ingredients, and friendly service. The food and wines were very reasonably priced.
The best location, great price, good wine list, and delicious pizza! I've been multiple times and never been disappointed. Good vegetarian options.
The food was very good, the service was excellent and the ambiance made us feel very welcome. Highly recommended
Incredibly tasteful and cosy place, excellent waitress that even exchange some language information with our Brazilian party. We loved, went there twice!
Staff is too rude! We were just hoping to have a good meal, and the staff was so rude, and we left the place...

Had a wonderful meal with my wife here after visiting the Sacre Coeur. The service was very hospitable and the atmosphere was cozy. This is a perfect spot for casual Italian done well with friendly service.
Got the half pizza and half salad- best pizza ever! Sat outside and our waitress was so nice and helpful! Love this place!!
We visited as a family, parents and 2 kids. The food was amazing, the staff friendly and welcoming. I highly recommend the vegetarian pizza - delicious !

column3: Great little Italian by Sacre Coeur
column4: Really good find close to top of hill by Sacre Coeur. The antipasti and cheese plate for starters were wonderful and the pizzas delicious. Excellent service with a smile and very nice setting. Good for vegetarians as well.
New Yorker visiting Paris. Visited this restaurant on a recommendation, expected little but got the best damn Italian meal we‚Äôve had in a long time. Highhhhly recommend!
Great atmosphere, great staff and great food! Very small but very cozy. I would deff go back there next time in Paris.
Good food, good price, everyone speaks english. Very cozy space. Would recomend this place to all my friends.
Very average pizza and incredibly rude manager, we didn't enjoy our meal at all and had to listen to the manager shouting at her waitresses all evening.
Pizza was so good! Bit of a hike up here but worth it. Staff is very nice and atmosphere is super chill.

What a find! This tiny little restaurant was absolutely superb-the food was great, the people very friendly and the atmosphere cosy. I wouldn‚Äôt normally chose a pizza, but it was lovely and the tiramisu amazing!

Fancied somehting with a real Parisienne atmosphere. Checked out Trip Advisor and found this restaurant. Couldnt have been happier. In a quiet road near the scare couer it is typical Parisienne. Food and atmosphere were 10/10.
This is certainly cosy but the pizzas are fantastic and the restaurant is interesting with friendly staff.

A very small restaurant with tasty pizzas. When in France and want an Italian pizza then this a place to go. Restaurant is too small so expect that you will not be able to move around. P.S: It is not good for groups.

Very special little almost home like restaurant with seven tables inside. Lovely staff and amazing pizza. They offer two sizes if you need one for little ones. Great wine and amazing deserts homemade tiramisu and lemon meringue won it for us.
A very cozy, warm feeling restaurant, just a stone‚Äôs throw from Sacre Coeur. We had a Napoli pizza and a four seasons pizza. Both were excellent. The service was great and we had a lovely evening.

Eclectic setting and perfect location. You feel transported to a cottage in the past. Felt as if I was eating from grandma's kitchen. And to top it off, the food is great... omg that nutella pizza! It's a must stop for any foodie!

This is a small restaurant to the side of Sacre Coeur. Lovely fresh pizzas and a small menu of desserts. Service is quick, friendly and efficient. Food is excellent value. Well worth a detour to visit.
The salads and pizza we ordered were just perfect, the team is professional and they work very fast. Homie place.
Pizza to die for! The people who work here are a great help with the menu! The food is to die for and the deserts are Devine. Wine and cocktails are also a must! Would definitely be back.
We enjoyed dinner here on our last night in Paris, and were so glad we did! The food was delicious, and the restaurant itself was charming. Great Italian food in the shadow of the Sacre Coeur!
We as a group of 5 were thrown out of the restaurant because one of us wasn't hungry. Apparently, it is not possible to arrive with 5 people and order for 4
It's great pizza, very small restaurant, not fancy, but nice. The porcini pizza was amaizing! Perfect for lunch
The pizza I ate was better than in Rome. The dessert flute limoncelo was delicious. One word to describe this restaurant: PERFECT.
Nice spot right by the Sacre Coeur. Good options with both classic and interesting pizza choices. Better than most touristy joints nearby and the staff was helpful.
A real gem just around the corner from the Sacre Coeur. Great specials, and their antipasti are fresh and nice!

Went there based on Trip Advisor reviews and we weren't disappointed. The service was exceptional and the pizza was even better. Beautiful light crusts and generous toppings. Highly recommend to either eat in or take away and eat at the Sacre Coeur.
Small, cozy, friendly, yummy & clean! Tip-top quality of pizza & toppings with a sensible price. Loved it!

column3: Abendessen direkt an der sacre coeur!
column4: The Pizza and the Pasta are so delicious. I also Love the chardonnay they sell. The athmosphere is familiar and service is great. Always when in Paris I visit the babalou!

Simply prefect! A tiny, picturesque restaurant with fine italian cuisine, excellent service and wonderful atmosphere. During our 3 days stay in paris we visited it twice. It was impossible to resist the temptation of coming back.

column3: Hidden gem in the shadows of Sacre Coeur
column4: Visited this cosy place together with my friends and got a charming welcome. The pizza choices and suggestions were extensive and as expected delicious. Would definitely recommend this!
Small one room restaurant. Good menu selection for food and wine. Friendly welcoming staff. Choices for vegetarians. White as well as tomato-based pizzas.
Great choice of pizzas in a cosy bar ambience. Dessert was delicious. Prices reasonable. Stone's throw from the basilica in montemarte. Highly recommended.
Cute, unique interior. Good food- we had the chacutterie plate (can't go wrong) shared truffle pizza and some raviloli. It was very reasonable, and nice

column3: Decent food, awesome spot, nice service
column4: Right by Sacre Coeur. A few cozy tables outside. Accommodating service. We have the meat/cheese plate, a small salad and a pizza. A good choice when your feet are sore and you need a spot to recoup.

Pizzas were excellent and the staff was super friendly and spoke great English! There was good variety and the food tasted great. Top marks for the excellent Caipirinha we were served and the lovely tiramisu. Will definitely go back!

We visited this Italian eatery while in Paris. The food was excellent. We actually ate here twice as the waitstaff spoke good English. We would definitely recommend to anyone needing pizza while in Paris.

Had a nice meal here! It's quite reasonably priced for the location right at the bottom of the sacre coeur and has a great family feel. Standard italian food but a nice atmosphere. Would go again definitely
Close to Sacre C≈ìur really lovely atmosphere, good service nice wine not too expensive all in all well worth a visit.

This restaurant has great pizzas with a very fair price. Service is friendly, but not invasive. The ingredients are amazing. We visited the place twice (my wife, my 3 year old daughter and myself). I recommend this restaurant to anyone going to Montmartre.

If you would pass this bistro, you would not stop. It is located behind the Sacre Coeur. We had some freshly made pasta and very nice pizza. The waiter was so friendly. Definitely a place to come back.

column3: Cosy place to dine and very friendly staff
column4: A Cosy place for dine and a superb staff to help when I couldn't understand their French menu. Must try their tiramisu desert. Simply delicious.
Fabulous pizzas. Freshly prepared and made. Staff also friendly. Charming decor. Only suggestion: pit the olives.

Great pizza, good atmosphere and friendly staff. Very near to the Sacre Coeur. The blanche pizzas are fantastic. I went for the "speck", one of the best pizzas I've ever eaten. Lovely tiramisu, a bit small though.
Next to the Sacre Coure, an excellent place to relax and enjoy a variety of pizzas and some pasta. Good wine choices and an outstanding Tiramisu.
The pizza is as good as any we have in Italy! Family run - really nice people. A bit off the beaten path - worth seeking out. Nice change from the typical Parisienne restaurants
Clearly home made pizzas made with love. Would have eaten 2 pizzas if I could have fitted it in! Would certainly go back!

column3: A must try while you're hear!
column4: My daughter was living in Montmarte and recommended. Excellent pizzas and salads! Great service! Fairly priced. An overall excellent value! Tres bon!!!
Nice place, reservations recommended. Pizzas are big, full of taste. You'll sit as close to your neighbour as to your loved one so no privacy.
Great food, ambience, value...right next door to Sacre Coeur this quirky little restaurant was like a step back in time with a warm welcome and delicious food - thoroughly recommended.

Very nice and "cozy" restaurant. The pizza's were delicious and the service was top! It is nicely located next to the Sacre Coeur, but still kind of hidden. This is probably the reason why it is not to crowded and to commercial!
Cozy little place, very polite waiter, fresh products, delicious dishes and... little price. This restaurant is a pearl among all the tourist traps around Montmartre. Really surprising.
We visited here last night following the trip advisor reviews. The restaurant was homely and lovely and the food (pizza or crepes) were perfect. Would visit again if we had longer in Paris
A warm welcome in to Babalou. Staff are very friendly and welcoming, the food was very tasty and well priced. If I come back to Paris I will definitely go there again.
Literally the best pizza ever. The service was excellent and the inside has a lot of character. Also, they do the best home made tiramisu!

We really enjoyed dinner here. Nothing fancy, but they do a very good Pizza, have a good wine list, and the whole place has a quaint, welcoming and unaffected feel. The view of Sacre Coeur out of the window is undoubtedly impressive too.

A lovely evening with the guys at La Babalou. This is a small, intimate restaurant with a perfect side view of the Sacre Coeur. Service is excellent, food (especially pizza) is really good and the wine list extensive. A fantastic little find!
Great meal of pizza, pasta, prosecco and beer. Look no further. It's at the foot of the steps to the side of Sacre Coeur.

We visited this cool little place tonight and really enjoyed the pizza and the wine. The place is very small but I liked that, it had a very cool vibe and not at all pretentious. Service was great and an all round good atmosphere.
Just go there. Top food and service! Really enjoyed it. Very tasty and cosy little place. Friendly hosts. Great great great great.
Right by the Sacre Coeur. Great value, excellent pizza. Superb desserts - we tried the chocolate fondant, tiramisu and Nutella pizza - all recommended!

column3: Delicious fresh pizza in a charming and quirky setting
column4: Really lovely little pizza restaurant just behind the Sacre Coeur. The service was excellent, the pizza was delicious and fresh and the room was charming and quirky. Highly recommend this place for a great meal in Montmartre.

Excellent and kind service, wonderful food, and on the plus side once you leave the restaurant you can walk 50 meters to a fantastic view of Paris. Would recommend to anyone one of the best pizzas in Paris.

Fairly basic menu but certainly make the most of their ingredients. The pizzas tasted amazing and service was excellent and very friendly. Staff all spoke excellent English, which was a bonus, as my French is sketchy at best. Highly recommended.

column3: One of the best pizza ever
column4: One of the best pizza we ever had, thin with great fresh ingredients in a small and very cosy environment it was great after a long walk in Paris.

column3: One of the best pizza in Paris !
column4: One of the best pizza in Paris ! Out of time design at the top the hill of Montmartre. Cool place for a friendly date or to meet the neighborhood.
This is a little gem, right next to Sacre Coeur! You cannot see the church, but the coziness and friendly service make up for that! And the pizza was simply awesome!
Small and cosy with a lovely authentic feel, meals are good value and quite possibly the nicest pizza I've ever had! Booking is necessary as there aren't loads of tables but also very easy to do.
This small restaurant is right next to the Sacr√©-Coeur. The service was very good. We both had pizza's and I must say that these pizza's were really tasty. The starter was ok.
Our waiter Mario was very professional and very friendly! Thank you Mario for making our experience pleasant!
Cosy and delicious little Italiaan restaurant, pizza's are in one word perfect! Good wines, very friendly staff, nice atmosphere, it's the second time i've been there, and will absolutely go again!

column3: Great Italian in a great location
column4: Within a stones throw from Sacre Coeur, Babalou is a great place to dine. Their pizza is amazing, and their prices are fair. I would definitely recommend this place. Be sure to call ahead to ensure a table.

column3: Great pizzeria ight next to Sacre Coeur!
column4: Amazing staff, it is not a big place but they combine two cafes together if needed, so you usually have a spot. Great pizza - very thin, great service, great wine! :) really enjoyed the dinner there

And this is the BEST pizza in Montmartre, maybe Paris! Ask for the 4 fromaggio. Usually 4 fromage is the best option is France because french cheese is so good, but it appears the best 4 fromage in France is made only with italian cheese!!!!!

My husband and I stopped here after a Montmarte walking tour. They were very tourist friendly, and the pizza was delicious!!! I can't stress that enough. The pricing wasn't bad at all. Probably one of our favorite places we ate in Paris!
Great restaurant , we tried pizza and pasta ! Both were very tasteful. The pricing was good as well.Didn't try the dessert though.
We thought the restaurant was really charming. As small as your living room. The staff are attentive and the pizzas very tasty. I would go again if I was in the area. Make sure you book!

column3: I'd go again in a heartbeat
column4: Lovely ambience, lovely food, attentive staff. I couldn't ask for anything more. Except perhaps, for larger tables, but you get that in a place like this! Really pleasant experience. Thanks
Meal is simple however very testy. Good location was very closed to Sacre Cer basilica on the top of Monmartre. Atmosphere inside and waitress were very shiny. Cate's machine looks amazing.

Just a few steps away from the Sacre Coeur and the cueing Montmartre is this small Italian restaurant. Normal prices and much better than the "standaard".Tasty pizza's and very friendly personel. A recommandation!
Took a risk but the music and food were delightfull ;))). Owner very pro customer oriented. Plenty of people giving typical parisian atmosphere.
The food was good, nice friendly atmosphere. Well priced - no complaints, a good place to go with kids.
Delicious pizza and reasonable prices in Montemarte. Enjoyed the nutella pizza foe dessert as well. Service was fast and friendly.
Eat beef pizza, we loved it. And the prizes are really good. Ravioli with mashroom was also delicious. And the service was friendly.

Restaurant is very cozy and service is really good. Antipasti was really delicious. the quality of mozzarella was really nice. Unfortunately outside seats are only for couples. Dishes were good. Selection of wine is short, but you can find all types.
Very nice food, warm friendly welcome. Helpful menu advise. Didn't feel rushed. Highly recommended place to eat when in Paris.
Visited this restaurant twice in the last week, was so good we had to go back! Lovely inside and out, good service, great wine, reasonably priced and just great food....
Delicious, reasonably priced food coupled with friendly, welcoming service and a cosy, Parisian atmosphere made for a memorable dining experience. We will definitely be back...

column3: Great food, great service - made a great end to our trip.
column4: Read reviews on here. After a lovely walk round montmarte we went to Babalou. The food really is as good as the reviews say....service really friendly. Well worth a visit :-)

Definitely worth the hike up the stairs from Montmartre. Top food, great service from an American with immaculate French & English and all for a reasonable price. Trying the spicy olive oil is a must!

column3: Good food, good price, good location
column4: Babalou, at the foot of Sacre Coeur, is well located for a tasty meal after the majestic view of Paris and the beautiful church. The service is excellent, the food is good simple pizza, salad and antipasti and it's great value in Paris.

A lovely little restaurant with a living room-feeling. Had a enormous pizza topped with a huge amount of cheese. Luckely you can decide to order only half of it. The homemade pannacotta was also very good.

column3: Tiny but great pizza and service
column4: We had lunch here. The waiter was great, recommending the pizza and the wine. The appetizer was a great selection of meat, cheese and olives. Overall a great experience. Note however there is only seating for about 20-25 people.

column3: Probably the best pizza we 've ever had
column4: Amazing pizza, friendly service, unique and warm interior. Absolutely worth the money. Not a tourist trap, although it is located so close to Montmartre.
A good choice in Montmartre, delicious pizza and good value. This little restaurant is full every night, but we went a couple of times and got a table early in the evening. The service is excellent.

column3: Relaxing time in small family restaurant
column4: Very small family restaurant with nice funky and jazz music. Older woman serves and her husband is cooking good meals. Very relaxing place near to tourists place but is not tourists place :-).
Excellent little restaurant with nice soft music. We had pizza & ravioli which were excellent! They also serve very nice drinks. Highly recommended!
A great find right beside Sacre Coeur. The servers were really nice and the pizza was fantastic. Wine list is also pretty great!

This restaurant was recommended to us by the hotel and it ticked every box, fantastic atmosphere fantastic food and wine, the place was packed out with tourists and locals. Its worth traveling across paris for! Enjoy !
Good location. Service was excellent. Pizza was so-so. Credit card machine was broke so had to walk a long way for ATM.
Sat down for a Pizza. It was ok. Nothing to write home about. The location is great - right next to the Sacre Ceur. The staff was pleasant.

This little italian restaurant situated behind the sacre couer serves delicious fresh and homemade food. Nice decor and a friendly atmosphere. The service was excellent and the suggestion of a nutella pizza for dessert is a must have!
I was surprised to get service in Finnish in this restaurant! Pizza was great and I really enjoyed the style of this restaurant. LP record Disraeli Gears by Cream caught my eye.
Brilliant little restaurant - great antipasti and home made pizzas all at reasonable prices (especially for Paris).

column3: Decent pizza next to the Sacre Coeur
column4: Given the tourist traps around this area, you could do worse than have lunch at this little place. Decent food, reasonable price

column3: Another superb meal in my fav restaurant in Montmarte.
column4: Great food, great hosts, great location. Superb pasta, delicious pizza, tasty tiramisu. Booking probably best but they will always try and fit you in. We will call again.

column3: Great ambiance, lovely food, friendly staff
column4: We enjoyed our dinner here. Cozy interior and good pizza's. Lovely place to have a drink and appetizer before dinner and a cocktail on the outside terracr afterwards! Make a reservation because it's a popular restaurant.
A good place for a pizza and it's definitely not expensive eventhough it's located right next to the sacr√© coeur! Loved the music that was playing as well (Sixto rodriguez).
Service was super friendly and heplful, food was excellent. Out of the crowded tourist area. Highly recommended.
Quaint little restaurant, with very friendly and helpful staff. Food was amazing... Try the pizza, it was the best I've had! All well priced too, well worth a visit!
Lovely atmosphere, friendly staff, and delicious food. Our waitress was personable and spoke some English.

column3: Very good pizzas and delicious Tiramisu
column4: Been to lunch at Babalou. Pizzas are excellent and the Tiramisu was one of the best ever. Great location and great service from the helpful staff.
Such a lovely petit place, typical french with great food and really easy going personnel. We concluded that we found a place with very good money value
A wonderful setting with lovely staff. The pizza and salad was mouth watering. The atmosphere was very comfortable and was our saviour from the coldest May in Paris.
brilliant pizzas, but even better atmosphere.I'd just recommend taking the funicular instead of walking to avoid the scam.artists!
Beautiful pizza right near the Sacre Coeur, we got take away and sat on the hill watching the view. The lady that served us was lovely talking to us about our travels while we waited.

The restaurant is quite hard to find, it's up a lot if steps but it is well worth the effort, the food is beautiful and reasonable for Paris, and the staff were very friendly and helpful. Would definitely return again and recommend to others.

Very close to Sacre-Coeur but away from the crowds. We had lunch here. Very friendly waitress who spoke great English. Both had excellent pizzas. Price reasonable and my wife had a nice glass of wine. Would go back.
This was a nice little pizza place in Montmartre. I would recommend going here if in the area. Very small dining area.
We were really pleased with the food & the nice customer service! We enjoyed the small cozy atmosphere. Highly recommend!
The service was superb. Both waitresses working were very caring and their english was very good. Food was delicious and decent sized portion. Highly recommend!

This was a good little restsurant, with nice pizza and friendly staff, but I was neither blown away by the value or quality. Its worth one meal there, but there are just as good places around the same area.

Not sure if I'm really fussy but don't get the rave reviews, it was nice, great location, nice atmosphere. The 2 woman working there were really kind and made us feel welcome. Good value... Don't expect too much and you'll be pleasantly surprised.

Really cute little place with good pizza and tiramisu. The staff was friendly, and the prices were reasonable. We were seated at a table by the window and had a lovely view of the Sacr√© Coeur. Definitely plan ahead and make a reservation.
I loved this place - it was weird to find such a good little restaurant next to such a big tourist attraction. VERY nice people, good wine, good food, good location.

column3: Lovely small and very personal Italian Restaurant with great Pizza and Pasta, we really loved it!
column4: If you want a break after visiting Sacre Coeur and a glass of wine and some tasty fresh food and very reasonable prices, then make a reservation or just drop it! They are friendly and everything is really great

column3: Great pizza in the shadow of Sacre Coeur
column4: Had a lovely evening in this tiny pizza restaurant in a road running parallel to Sacre Coeur. Very friendly & welcoming staff ... And great pizza too! Be well advised to book ahead as very small. Also saw people getting take always.
I was here in October and then again this past week. The pizza is really good and the prices very reasonable. The atmosphere is very comfortable and welcoming.
It's very small so not for the claustrophobic, the service was great and the food was excellent. Very good value for money casual dining The hot chocolate cake was sumptuous.

column3: Excellent food and very food value for money
column4: Service was fantastic and food was great , best pizzas i have ever had !! Good location and easy to find 2 x large pizzas and 2 large glasses of wine 29 euros very cheap for Paris

So fresh as were the pasta choices which had combinations I would have never dreamed of making. Small but unique and service was superb. A friend liked the reviews on Tripadvisor and suggested we go.....was a great choice.
Such a treat, delicious pizza and the mushroom ravioli was home made and seasoned perfectly. The waitress was really sweet and spoke English.

We strongly recommend everyone to take the trip to Montmartre and this lovely, small, informal and unpretentious restaurant. Serves great Italian food, we had delicious, spicy pizza and gorgeous mushroom ravioli with a fresh salad. The service was personal and attentive.
Amazing pizza...just like in Italy. Cozy place....very small so call ahead. Cheese and meat platter was excellent!

Very different from the touristy restaurants on place du tertre near Sacre Coeur. Delicious Italian food, very sympathetic reception and fair prices. Will definitely return when we visit Sacre coeur again.

Great serviece, great food! We only had a starter and Pizzas for main but the pasta and deserts looked equally as good. The vegeterain with added mozzerella was particularly good. Service with a smile and pleasant conversation topped it off.

Beautiful location just next to the sacre coeur, really friendly waitress, amazing food, the cheese board is delicious! Very small but very Parisienne and very charming. Totally recommend for a quiet dinner for two xx
Small, quaint and beautiful! Typically Parisian place with the size and atmosphere to match. Really great!
Great pizza! Lovely atmosphere. The staff were very helpful in finding a place for us on a busy Friday night. I would definitely go back.

column3: Good pizza, casual and helpful staff
column4: Just below Sacre Couer church, and the pizza was good, as was salad, big portions. Wine was nice too. The waitress was very helpful.

column3: Excellent italian food in a very original French petite restaurant
column4: Fresh, homemade pizza's, good wines and delightfull desserts. Opposite to the Sacre Coeur, place du tertre

column3: Great little restaurant, you must go.....
column4: We are so glad we booked this place, great atmosphere, great food, excellent staff, easy to find. Small but intimate with gorgeous food.
This is a delightful little restaurant very close to Sacre Coeur, serving great pizza and a small selection of other dishes. Great value, excellent service and atmosphere.

We found this restaurant in trip advisor and we took the recommendations. Believe all the excellent revues. V simple food done to the highest spec. Wine list short and sweet but perfect. 20 covers no more with quirky decor. Great great great
Best ingredients used at this wonderful little Italian restaurant tucked away from the crowds of Sacred Coeur. Great value - one of our top meals in Paris bar none.

Came here cos of the great reviews and were rewarded with fab service and delicious pizza/ravioli and salad. Great deserts too. Just a stone's throw from sacre coer but far enough away from the mad tourist crowds and inflated prices.
This was the best place we ate in Paris. Friendly staff that speak excellent english. It's only a small restaurant but it's very close to the sacre-coeur and the food is delicious.

column3: wow! blown away by taste price and service
column4: just a stones throw from the scare couer me and my girlfriend grabbed some amazing pizza and good wine for 40 euros. well worth it as the taste was exceptional! highly recommended!
Excellent service, quiet location and nice food. Relativly cheap, we paid 30 (plus tips) for two pizzas and 3 soda/water. The only negative thing was no menu in english. Have a nice meal @ Babalou!
My two teenage daughters and I had a great lunch here. Pizza plus dessert for 11 euros. Delicious pizzas and lovely chocolate dessert. Lovely little restaurant, and so close to Sacre Coeur.
Night sky view of Paris, and a quiet pizza in this great little pizza restaurant. Funky decor, friendly staff and modest prices. Babalou is worth a stop!

We went to this restaurant twice with friends while on a one month stay in Montmartre. Had pizza both times. My pizza was good, but our friend's was quite dry. The service was good the first time, but slow the second as it was very...More

column3: Fantastic food, nice atmosphere and pleasant service
column4: My husband and I went to this little very nice restaurant on our holiday in Paris. We loved the place. Very humbly and authentic interior and spotless clean. The food was outstanding - and especially the lemon ice creme for dessert was very tasty. The restaurant is located right beside the Scare Coeur on your right hand side when you are facing the church. The prices are small and the taste, service and atmosphere big. I would go there any time again.

We stopped here after sightseeing all day and came across this tiny cafe next to sacre coeur. We had the caprese salad and a pizza and both were amazing. Very good value and not at all touristy or a trap. Best meal experience yet in Paris and probably of whole European vacation so far. Highly recommended!

I was on a study abroad trip. Myself and four other students were starving and decided to stop in this cozy cafe. The food was delicious and the dessert (like a chocolate lava cake) was phenomenal!!!!! And for 11 euros for lunch it was a great deal.  The waiter was great, friendly, warm, and inviting. He spoke English very well and was a sport when we wanted to take pictures. I would definitely recommend a stop in here. It is in the Montmartre area, very close to Sacre Coeur.  TRES BON!!

We stumbled across this small quaint funky restaurant whilst visiting Sacre Ceour and was delighted to find that even though it was right next to the Church, (round to the right if you're facing towards the church), you could imagine that you were in a small village away from all the hustle and bustle that was minutes away! It wasn't at all touristy or like all the other restaurants that was horribly touristy! Pizza was amazing, probably the best pizza we've ever had! (We are massive pizza fans)! We will definitely be back!

This was the best pizza I've had in my life. Very small place (not a tourist trap) with great ambiance. Simple, but fresh ingredients and the olive oil they give you to go along with your meals is to die for. Will definitely come back if ever in Paris again.

column3: Excellent food, nice atmosphere, warm service
column4: We were tired and hungry after a long morning of sightseeing in Paris. It was near the Sacre Coeur where we started to look for a place to eat. We wanted to avoid any tourist traps and find something nice. We were lucky because only 200 m walking on Rue Lamarck we have noticed this tiny bistro. Tiny might be the only negative aspect in case you are not used to the Parisian bistros. I think we were served by the land lady or by someone directly involved in the business. She beautifully completed the warm atmosphere of the place and made us feel good and take care of. This kind of treatment is not something you find easily in Paris especially close to a landmark such as Sacre Coeur. They serve Italian food and we found it delicious. I strongly recommend it when you're in Monmartre area.
